name: Backer-On Zinc-Plated Cement Board Screws, 1-1/4 in. (200-Pack)
description: Use Backer-On 1-1/4 in. Zinc-Plated Steel Flat-Head Square Cement Board Screws (200-Pack) to attach cement board to wood or light-gauge steel studs. These zinc-plated screws are perfect for moist areas, such as showers and countertops. Thread designed for easy installation. No pre-drilling required.Use to attach cement board to wood or light gauge steel studsIdeal for use with showers, backsplashes, countertops and floorsSteel constructionRolled gimlet drive is easy to start in dense boardPatented/serrated for lower installation torque#2 square drive reduces cam-outRib design under .375 in. ultrathin wafer-head counter-sinks for flush-seating in boards#10 diameter for increased strength in dense boardZinc-platedResists corrosion

attributes.value: Attaching HardiBacker fiber-cement backerboard to wood or light gauge (26-20) steel
